abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL #135         	INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN SHARON TYUS An ordinance to vacate public surface rights for vehicle, equestrian and pedestrian travel in a _______= " ._____= portion of the 15  foot wide east/west alley in City Block 5090 abutting 4540-4542, 4900-4904, 4906-4908 and 4910-4912 Union and 4547, 4541, 4545 N. Union, same being bounded by Union, Geraldine, Bircher, and Lillian in the City of St. Louis, Missouri, as hereinafter described, in accordance with Charter authority, and in conformity with Section l4 of Article XXI of the Charter and imposing certain conditions on such vacation.
